name: Divorian Alpha 1
description:
Welcome to Divorian! In this game, you will be playing as a robot trying to solve his 2 tasks: returning to human and solving global warming. As you play this game sometimes you may encounter enemies, But battle you're way through them and platform your way to the end. I'm not going to say anything else tho because that's just spoiling you which would make the game boring and not fun.

Enjoy the alpha!
